title: Typotheque: Indian Summer News
content:
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  
BACK-UP T-SHIRT  
Inspired by a true story (accident where I lost three months of work,  
including all of ready to be released Fedra Sans), this t-shirt should serve  
as a reminder to do your regular back-up of your computer.

Design of the t-shirt is conveniently flipped so you are confronted with the  
message every time you see yourself in a mirror. In addition, female t-shirt  
is also reversed (inside-out) to emphasize the effect.  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/tshirts/back\_up/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210632/http:/www.typotheque.com/tshirts/back_up/)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  
SPRING T-SHIRT  
Spring t-shirt presents a collection of flowers, grasses and herbs found on  
the way to work on one spring day. This t-shirt brings a piece of nature to  
your home or work. Be part of the nature.  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/tshirts/spring\_t-shirt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210632/http:/www.typotheque.com/tshirts/spring_t-shirt/)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  
DOT DOT DOT 10  
Finally available is a new issue of Dot Dot Dot magazine, published by our  
partner company. DDDX is a montage of articles drawn from issues 2—9. This  
is not a retrospective act, more a logical next step; a slight return in  
response to the self-righteous statement of intent on the cover of issue 1;  
a reply to ourselves after five years’ trial & error.  
 [http://www.typotheque.com/books/DDD10](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210632/http:/www.typotheque.com/books/DDD10)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -  
RSS FEED  
If you would like to stay in touch, and get all news from Typotheque (not  
just an irregular digest such this email newsletter), you can now subscribe  
to our RSS news feed. In RSS we publish for example preview of new fonts,  
new articles, and other smaller news.  
 [feed://www.typotheque.com/rss](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329210632/http:/www.typotheque.com/rss)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
author: Miss Tiffany : 28 September, 2005 - 11:27am
